targets.queryText: SELECT validator_lat AS latitude, validator_lon AS longitude, account, validator_ip FROM validators_geo_data WHERE timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM validators_geo_data)
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT validator_lat AS latitude, validator_lon AS longitude, account, validator_ip FROM validators_geo_data WHERE timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM validators_geo_data)

targets.queryText: SELECT vfn_lat AS latitude, vfn_lon AS longitude, account, vfn_ip FROM validators_geo_data WHERE timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM validators_geo_data)
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT vfn_lat AS latitude, vfn_lon AS longitude, account, vfn_ip FROM validators_geo_data WHERE timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM validators_geo_data)

panels.description: Total committed rounds averaged on 10 minutes
panels.title: Network Status

panels.description: Average participation uptime for 30 days. A node is required to propose at least one block every 12 hours to be counted as up.
panels.title: Validator Participation SLA

panels.description: Average fullnode uptime for 30 days. A fully synchronized fullnode is counted as up.
panels.title: Fullnode Uptime SLA

panels.description: Number of upstream validator peers a full node can proxy transactions up to
panels.title: Fullnode Upstream Peers

panels.description: The error rate of main loop.
panels.title: Error Rate

panels.description: This panel tracks whether the key manager successfully ran within the last hour and determined if the keys are still fresh. If so, the key manager is healthy and 1 is displayed, otherwise, the key manager is unhealthy and 0 is displayed.
panels.title: Key Manager: Keys Still Fresh (Last Hour)
